title: Coronation Street's viewers shock as Bethany has sex with groomer - brace yourself for more "uncomfortable" viewing
text:

Coronation Street's Nathan bedded Bethany Platt in shocking scenes last night. 
The evil groomer took the vulnerable teen back home with him while she was drunk, leaving viewers feeling uncomfortable and shocked. 
While viewers praised the decision to broadcast the child grooming storyline, but were left wondering what will happen next. 
The ITV soap has been screening scenes in which character Bethany Platt (Lucy Fallon) has been targeted by Nathan Curtis (Chris Harper), a much older man. 
He had earlier been arrested over suspicions about another girl's disappearance, but was later released and asked Bethany to provide an alibi for him. She refused, but later realised he was actually innocent. Coronation Street's decision to broadcast a child grooming storyline has been commended by viewers (Photo: ITV) 
Rushing to see him at the salon to apologise, she met Mel who took her out on the town - not realising she is in on the grooming scheme. 
Plying the teen with vodka Mel arranged for Nathan to meet her, and stole her phone. 
Bethany ended up sleeping with Nathan before he was seen on the phone telling someone "It worked like a dream...remember what I said - this girl is special." 
Next week Bethany will admit to mum Sarah that she and Nathan are dating, but lies about them sleeping together. 
Actress Lucy Fallon, who plays Bethany, warned it will be "uncomfortable viewing" as Nathan's real intentions become clearer. Viewers praise the storyline 
Soap fans thought it was important that some light was shed on the issue of grooming youngsters. Read More 'I was so young': Child abuse victim who inspired Coronation Street storyline tells frightening story 
Pritha Bardhan (@PrithaBardhan) wrote on Twitter: "Shocked with what happened to Bethany on Corrie tonight but glad it's being covered as it happens in the real world." 
Vikki Black (@Vikki-Black) posted: "Bethany is in so much danger. This storyline is so good. Showing how easy it is for young people to be groomed." 
Louis Brian (@Lewisjbsmith87) said: "That was a dark episode of Corrie think every teenager should watch it." In Friday night's double episode, Nathan manipulated the teenager by arranging for her to get drunk before taking her back to his house (Photo: ITV) 
Jessica McKay (@JessicaMcKay91) wrote: "Such an uncomfortable but important storyline in corrie."
